original_text: And they found it written in the Law that the Lord had commanded by Moses that the people of Israel should dwell in booths during the feast of the seventh month,
korean_text: 율법에 기록된 바를 본즉 여호와께서 모세를 통하여 명령하시기를 이스라엘 자손은 일곱째 달 절기에 초막에서 거할지니라 하였고

sentences.original_text: And they found it written in the Law
that the Lord had commanded by Moses
that the people of Israel should dwell in booths
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성은 초막에 거해야 한다는 것

sentences.original_text: during the feast of the seventh month,
